### Task 7: ADHD Conferences

**New Title:** Register for ADDA + CADDRA ADHD conferences
**Notes to Add:**
```
Ranked by fun for medically literate non-scientist:
1. ADDA International Conference - Best for non-scientists, practical support
2. CADDAC (Nov 1-2, 2025) - Canadian, patient-focused
3. CADDRA (Oct 17-19, Vancouver) - More clinical but in Canada

ADDA: add.org/2025-annual-international-conference-on-adhd/
CADDRA: caddra.ca/events/future-conferences/
```

## Manual Fix Required: Things App Not Responding

Things 3 app is not responding to AppleScript commands or URL schemes.
Try:
1. Force quit Things (Cmd+Q or force quit)
2. Relaunch Things manually
3. Check if Things is updated
4. May need to grant automation permissions in System Preferences > Privacy > Automation

Once Things is working, use these IDs to make the updates above.
